fieldUpdates.description: Contents of the Initial Research Findings/Summary field are appended to the Initial Research Findings/Summary Log field
fieldUpdates.formula:
UPPER( $User.FirstName ) & " " & UPPER( $User.LastName )& " (" & TEXT(MONTH(TODAY())) & "/"& TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) & "/"& TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))& " " &TEXT(CASE(VALUE(MID(TEXT( NOW() ) , 12, 2)) , 0, 20,
1, 21, 2, 22,3, 23,4, 0,5, 1,6, 2,7, 3,8, 4,9, 5,10, 6,11, 7,12, 8,13, 9,14,10,15, 11,16, 12,17, 13,18, 14,19, 15,20, 16,21, 17,22, 18,23, 19, 24)) & ":" & MID(TEXT( NOW() ) , 15, 2) & " EDT)" &
BR() & "- " & Initial_Research_Findings_Summary__c & BR() & BR() & Initial_Research_Findings_Summary_Log__c

rules.fullName: ASO Issue Update

criteriaItems.value: Pending PAC Review - Additional Notice Received,Reviewed in PAC - PSST NEW Escalation,Reviewed in PAC - PSST Fast Lane

rules.fullName: Paychex PEO Issue 2
rules.formula:
AND( BEGINS(TEXT(Status__c),"Pending PAC Review"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Paychex_PEO_Issue__c,"Yes")) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Paychex_PEO_Issue__c,"No")),
OR( CONTAINS(Field_Contact_Name__r.Title,"PEO"), BEGINS(Prospect_Client_Number__c,"741"), CONTAINS(Submission_Notes__c,"PEO")))

rules.fullName: Populate Closed Date
rules.description: Populate the Last Closed on Date based on a populated Closure Code

rules.fullName: Populate Reopen Date
rules.description: Populate the Reopen Date when a Status value of "Closed" is changed, and reset the Closure Code and Last Closed on Date fields.
rules.formula: And( ISCHANGED(Status__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'')), OR( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = 'Closed in PAC - Communicated Findings to Client', TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = 'Closed in PAC - Field to Relay Findings to Client', TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = 'Closed in PAC - No Communication Necessary'), NOT(BEGINS(TEXT(Status__c),'Closed in PAC')))

rules.fullName: Process Reference PAC - Init Research Findings
rules.description: Contents of the Initial Research Findings/Summary field are appended to the Initial Research Findings/Summary Log field, prior to the clearing out of the Initial Research Findings/Summary field

rules.fullName: Process Reference PAC - PAC Follow Up Notes
rules.description: Contents of the PAC Follow Up Notes field are appended to the PAC Follow Up Notes Log field, prior to the clearing out of the PAC Follow Up Notes field

rules.fullName: Process Reference PAC Field Update Comment
rules.description: Contents of the Field Update Comments field are appended to the Field Update Comments Log field, prior to the clearing out of the Field Update Comments field

rules.fullName: Ref PAC - Closed Submission email with populated Client Contact
rules.description: Send closed submission email to Field Contact that does contain Client Contact info
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = '012700000001kI1' && ( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Communicated Findings to Client') ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c, 'Withdrawn - Duplicate/Additional Notice')) && NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Contact_Name__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Contact_Name__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Contact_Email__c))

rules.fullName: Ref PAC - Closed Submission email without populated Client Contact
rules.description: Send closed submission email to Field Contact that does not contain Client Contact info
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = '012700000001kI1' && ( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Field to Relay Findings to Client') ) && NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Contact_Name__c))

rules.fullName: Ref PAC - New Submission email with populated Field Contact
rules.description: Send new submission received email to Field Contact that does contain Client Contact info
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = '012700000001kI1' && ISBLANK(Sent_New_Submission_Email__c) && NOT(ISBLANK(Prompt_New_Submission_Email__c)) && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received') && NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Contact_Name__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Contact_Name__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Contact_Email__c)) && Client_Contact_Email__c <> "pacmailtest@paychex.com" && Client_Contact_Email__c <> "PACMailTest@paychex.onmicrosoft.com"

rules.fullName: Ref PAC - New Submission email without populated Client Contact
rules.description: Send new submission received email to Field Contact that does not contain Client Contact info
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = '012700000001kI1' && ISBLANK(Sent_New_Submission_Email__c) && NOT(ISBLANK(Prompt_New_Submission_Email__c)) && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received') && NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Contact_Name__c)) && (ISBLANK(Client_Contact_Email__c))

criteriaItems.value: Resolved by official Abatement Request (no Appeal),Resolved by sending Letter of Explanation

rules.fullName: Update Number of Follow Up Date Changes
Update Status to Pending PAC review
rules.formula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received"), ISCHANGED( OwnerId ),
OR( OwnerId="00G700000044XLM", OwnerId="00G700000044XLO"),
OR( PRIORVALUE( OwnerId ) = "00G700000044XLJ", PRIORVALUE( OwnerId ) = "00G700000044XLK", PRIORVALUE( OwnerId ) = "00G700000044XLL", PRIORVALUE( OwnerId ) = "00G700000044XLN"))

rules.fullName: Update the Owner Name field tp the Queue named PAC Group F
rules.formula: AND(RecordTypeId = "012700000001kI1", OR( OwnerId = "00G700000044XLJ",OwnerId = "00G700000044XLK", OwnerId ="00G700000044XLL", OwnerId ="00G700000044XLN", OwnerId = "00G0g000003ukMb"), TEXT(Status__c) = "Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received", TEXT( Paychex_PEO_Issue__c) <> "Yes", Revenue_Location__c = 919 || (Revenue_Location__c > 3999 && Revenue_Location__c < 4100))
